reviewText: My four children have been raised on Signing Time; every video in the series is great.  My two-year-old requests it every day, and he has come to know several hundred words.  In fact, his main mode of communication is American Sign Language, because of these videos, and his parents trying to speak it when we can.  The series is very well done, with good, catchy songs and graphics.  Leah's Farm is particularly great because it deals with animals; kids dig animals.
